channel.title: Basic help
channel.description:
okay i have a blank source and client
the run says:
your server is now up. . . . . 'java' is not recognized or an external command. operable program or batch file. press any key to continue . . .
compile says:
note:stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API. note:recompile with -xlint:deprecation for details. you have successfully compiled press any key to continue . . .
and when i try to run the client it says:
'java' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. press any key to continue . . .
please help me out guys and if u know how to code a blank server can u help me out =)

item.title: Basic help
item.dc:creator: @tyb97 tyb97
item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

[quote=“dragon nax, post:5, topic:421408”]fine fix this then

i changed my client edit folder to this VV

@echo off
Title Compiler
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_01\bin\javac.exe” *.java
pause

and i get 100 errors how do i fix it[/quote]
Its your compiler that you edited sir

Read full topic

item.description:

its not my compiler its my client

item.title: Basic help
item.dc:creator: @tyb97 tyb97
item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

You have to edit your run.bat, and your compiler.bat to your java path, or set you path and classpath variables.

Read full topic
